CmdLine: apt-get -y install wget &&     cd /tmp &&     wget -q http://cache.ruby-lang.org/pub/ruby/2.1/ruby-2.1.4.tar.gz &&     cd / &&     tar -xzf /tmp/ruby-2.1.4.tar.gz &&     (cd ruby-2.1.4/ && ./configure --disable-install-doc && make && make install) &&     rm -rf ruby-2.1.4/ &&     rm -f /tmp/ruby-2.1.4.tar.gz
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: echo 'install: --no-rdoc --no-ri' >> ~/.gemrc &&     echo 'update:  --no-rdoc --no-ri' >> ~/.gemrc &&     gem update --system 2.1.9 &&     gem install rails -v 4.2.0.beta2
Commands.Name: run
